comment:
* Information about a subscription which is downloadable to an eUICC using * {@link EuiccManager#downloadSubscription(DownloadableSubscription, boolean, PendingIntent). * *

For example, a DownloadableSubscription can be created through an activation code parsed from * a QR code. A server address can be parsed from the activation code to download more information * about the profile, such as carrier name, access rules, etc.

variables.name: encodedActivationCode
variables.comment:
* Activation code. May be null for subscriptions which are not based on activation codes, e.g.
     * to download a default subscription assigned to this device.
     * Should use getEncodedActivationCode() instead.
     * @hide
     * @deprecated - Do not use. This will be private. Use getEncodedActivationCode() instead.

methods.name: public static DownloadableSubscription forActivationCode(String encodedActivationCode)
methods.comment:
* Create a DownloadableSubscription for the given activation code. * *

This fills the encodedActivationCode field. Other fields like confirmationCode, * carrierName and accessRules may be filled in the implementation of * {@code android.service.euicc.EuiccService} if exists. * * @param encodedActivationCode the activation code to use. An activation code can be parsed * from a user scanned QR code. The format of activation code is defined in SGP.22. For * example, "1$SMDP.GSMA.COM$04386-AGYFT-A74Y8-3F815$1.3.6.1.4.1.31746". For detail, see * {@code com.android.euicc.data.ActivationCode}. Must not be null. * * @return the {@link DownloadableSubscription} which may be passed to * {@link EuiccManager#downloadSubscription}.

methods.name: public void setConfirmationCode(String confirmationCode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the confirmation code.
     * @hide
     * @deprecated - Do not use.

methods.name: public String getConfirmationCode()
methods.comment:
* Returns the confirmation code. * *

As an example, the confirmation code can be input by the user through a carrier app or the * UI component of the eUICC local profile assistant (LPA) application.

methods.name: public void setCarrierName(String carrierName)
methods.comment:
* Set the user-visible carrier name.
     * @hide
     * @deprecated - Do not use.

methods.name: public String getCarrierName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the user-visible carrier name. * *

Only present for downloadable subscriptions that were queried from a server (as opposed to * those created with {@link #forActivationCode}). May be populated with * {@link EuiccManager#getDownloadableSubscriptionMetadata}. * @hide

methods.name: public List<UiccAccessRule> getAccessRules()
methods.comment:
* Returns the {@link UiccAccessRule}s in list dictating access to this subscription. * *

Only present for downloadable subscriptions that were queried from a server (as opposed to * those created with {@link #forActivationCode}). May be populated with * {@link EuiccManager#getDownloadableSubscriptionMetadata}. * @hide

methods.name: public void setAccessRules(List<UiccAccessRule> accessRules)
methods.comment:
* Set the {@link UiccAccessRule}s dictating access to this subscription.
     * @hide
     * @deprecated - Do not use.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
